title: Be Careful Not to Overbuy
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Hey, did we buy enough?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What!? We bought all this, and you still think it’s not enough?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>We only bought chicken...... We should buy more meat to make the salad with tons of vegetables tastier.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>OMG. This is enough...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>No, it’s not enough. Mia, don’t you think it’s weird to only have chicken on Christmas?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>But Rina and Ayumu said that it’s fine......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu knows, Mia. You think there needs to be a turkey.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Uhh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>We’ll forget about beef and pork for now. We have to buy a turkey!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I appreciate it, but......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
